message: You can get a big board dev kit here for $4.30 (seems to include shipping after I signed up for a TI account.)  https://estore.ti.com/MSP-EXP430G2-MSP430-LaunchPad-Value-Line-Development-kit-P2031.aspx
Datasheet on the itty-bitty boards, and the programmer, so cute!  http://focus.ti.com/lit/ug/slau176d/slau176d.pdf
You you can get three itty-bitty boards with a USB programmer for $10.00 https://estore.ti.com/MSP-EXP430G2-MSP430-LaunchPad-Value-Line-Development-kit-P2031.aspx
There is a C IDE, and the microprocessors have 10 I/O pins.
